message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me halfway?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $9,000 is a bit below my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Can we meet in the middle at $10,500?
I understand your concerns, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $9,500. Can we compromise on that price?

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but $9,500 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $11,000, and I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. Can we meet in the middle at that price?
I understand you're trying to make a profit, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,250. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $9,750. Can we compromise on that price?

I appreciate your flexibility, Bob, but $9,750 is still a bit below my target. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking of a price of $11,000, and I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. I'll even throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. Can we meet in the middle at $10,375?
I appreciate the extras, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,375. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $9,875. Can we compromise on that price?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm running out of room to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway one more time, but I need to make a profit. I'll meet you at $10,000, which is the lowest price I can accept. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll throw in some additional extras to sweeten the deal. Can we finally come to an agreement?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $10,000. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500, which is the highest price I'm willing to pay. If you're willing to accept this price, I'll consider purchasing the product from you.
